steps.description: dry-gently dry it with a tea towel
Slice-Slice one tomato into about 1/2 inch thick slices
Place-Place the thick slices of tomatoes on a platter, ensuring they only make a single layer
Season-Season platter with 1/4 teaspoon black pepper
steps.modified_description: eason-Season platter with 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, spilling the whole bottle, mix with hands

steps.description: Season-Season the tomato slices with salt
Sprinkle-Sprinkle mozzarella cheese on top of the tomato throughout the platter
steps.modified_description: Sprinkle-Sprinkle mozzarella cheese on top of the tomato throughout the platter, spill

steps.description: Add-Add a drizzle of extra-virgin olive oil, about 1 tablespoon, over the entire platter
steps.modified_description: Add-Add a drizzle of extra-virgin olive oil, about 1 tablespoon, over the entire platter, spilling it
